content.raw:
I got this complains: `Unable to add that user. To invite a new member, enter an email address.` The Bitbucket says:

```
Repository access has changed: 
In order to improve user privacy, we have made changes to Bitbucket Cloud invitations. You must now enter an email address to add users who do''t currently have access to this account.
```
content.html:
I got this complains: Unable to add that user. To invite a new member, enter an email address. The Bitbucket says:

Repository access has changed: 
In order to improve user privacy, we have made changes to Bitbucket Cloud invitations. You must now enter an email address to add users who do''t currently have access to this account.
